properties.description:
Configure the Network Session Essentials solution monitoring conditions here. 

Choose between Detection or Hunting for Type and Anomaly or Static for Threshold type to tune monitoring according to environment.
properties.rawContent:
Ports,App,Protocol,Direction,Action,Type,ThresholdType,Threshold,Severity,Tactic,Name,Description
"389,636",*,*,*,*,Detection,Anomaly,,High,"InitialAccess,Execution",Suspicious LDAP Traffic,Adversary often abuse misconfigured LDAP servers or applications that use the LDAP servers in organizations. 
3389,*,*,*,*,Detection,Anomaly,,High,Lateral Movement,Suspicious Remote Desktop Network Traffic," TCP/3389 is the default port used by remote desktop. While remote desktop traffic is not uncommon on a network, any anomaly in traffic can be suspicious."
"9150,9151",tor,*,*,*,Detection,Static,1000,High,Command and Control,Suspicious TOR Traffic,"Traces Network traffic identified as The Onion Router (TOR), a benign anonymity network which can be abused for a variety of nefarious purposes. "
"139,445",smb,*,*,*,Detection,Static,1000,High,Lateral Movement,Suspicious SMB Traffic,Spike in the number of Server Message Block (SMB) traffic connections can be suspicious.
23,*,TCP,*,*,Hunting,Static,1000,Low,"Command and Control,Lateral Movement,Initial Access",Suspicious Telnet Port,Spike in the number of Telnet traffic connections. earch looks for spike in the number of Telnet traffic connections.
"5800,5801,5802,5803,5804,5805,5806,5807,5808,5809,5810",*,TCP,*,*,Hunting,Anomaly,,Low,"Command and Control,Initial Access",Suspicious VNC Traffic,Spike in the number of Virtual Network Computer traffic connections. 
135,*,TCP,*,*,Hunting,Static,1000,Low,Initial Access,Anomalous RPC Traffic,Spike in the number of Remote Procedure Call traffic connections.
